lines: 1. In wang`yorwa; wabironiKwaringo keth gi tho;Kendo ng`a modwaro wuoroNyak` odware kuomi.
2. In Adiera; Wachni kendeNyalo miwa rieko;Puonj madieri oa kuomi,In ma Japwodh chunywa.
3. In ngimawa; lielma notur Ohulo tekoni;Tho kata liel okanonyal Jogo magenoi.
4. In yo, Adiera, gi Ngima;Puonjwa wang`e yorno;Konywa warit adierano,Miwa ngimani, Ruoth.
